entries.name: Blue Whelp

traits.name: Arcane Puff
traits.effect: A small burst of arcane energy that rattles focus.

traits.name: Mana Sense
traits.effect: Instinctively detects magic and illusions.

entries.description: Curious arcane-touched hatchlings of the Blue Dragonflight.

entries.name: Blue Drakonid

traits.name: Arcane Lash
traits.effect: Imbues weapon strikes with raw mana.

traits.name: Runic Scales
traits.effect: Arcane-hardened scales blunt spell harm.

entries.description: Bipedal guardians who defend ley nexuses and archives.

entries.name: Blue Drake

traits.name: Mana Burst
traits.effect: Detonates a wave that saps casters.

traits.name: Ward of Wyrmrest
traits.effect: Briefly dampens incoming magic.

entries.description: Medium wyrms that police irresponsible spellwork.

entries.name: Blue Dragon

traits.name: Arcane Torrent
traits.effect: A devastating cone of pure mana.

traits.name: Spellweave
traits.effect: Twists ambient magic to protect allies.

entries.description: Sovereigns of arcane order and keepers of ley lines.

entries.name: Ancient Blue Wyrm

traits.name: Apex Surge
traits.effect: Unleashes a reality-warping blast of arcane might.

traits.name: Mana Mastery
traits.effect: Greatly resists magical disruption.

entries.description: Millennia-old blues whose will can shape ley itself.

entries.name: Black Whelp

traits.name: Cinder Breath
traits.effect: Belches embers that sear lightly.

traits.name: Stone-blood
traits.effect: Young scales already resist heat and slag.

entries.description: Soot-coated hatchlings born in cavernous lairs.

entries.name: Black Drakonid

traits.name: Magma Slash
traits.effect: Strikes ignite with molten edge.

traits.name: Basalt Hide
traits.effect: Stony scales reduce physical harm.

entries.description: Burly guardians forged by heat, pressure, and discipline.

entries.name: Black Drake

traits.name: Molten Roar
traits.effect: A blast that shakes courage and scorches.

traits.name: Obsidian Plates
traits.effect: Gleaming plates shrug off blades.

entries.description: Hardened drakes who prowl for weaknesses in enemy lines.

entries.name: Black Dragon

traits.name: Lava Gout
traits.effect: Spews molten stone in a burning wave.

traits.name: Earth Ward
traits.effect: Armors itself in shifting plates of rock.

entries.description: Earth-bound overlords whose rage is tectonic.

entries.name: Ancient Black Wyrm

traits.name: Cataclysmic Bellow
traits.effect: A shock that cracks stone and spirit.

traits.name: Obsidian Dominion
traits.effect: Near-impenetrable armor of living basalt.

entries.description: Primeval engines of ruin, avatars of earth’s wrath.

entries.name: Green Whelp

traits.name: Dream Dust
traits.effect: A sleepy puff that dulls awareness.

traits.name: Emerald Senses
traits.effect: Attuned to druidic magic and life.

entries.description: Playful guardians tied to the Emerald Dream.

entries.name: Green Dragonspawn

traits.name: Vinebind
traits.effect: Rooting magic that stalls a foe.

traits.name: Dream-warded Scales
traits.effect: Resists poison and mind-harm.

entries.description: Serpentine wardens who patrol groves and gateways.

entries.name: Green Drake

traits.name: Sleep Spores
traits.effect: A drifting cloud that lulls to drowsiness.

traits.name: Verdant Aegis
traits.effect: Life magic knits small wounds instantly.

entries.description: Healers and wardens soaring between Dream-touched boughs.

entries.name: Green Dragon

traits.name: Emerald Breath
traits.effect: A restorative yet soporific gale.

traits.name: Dreamveil
traits.effect: Shrouds allies in soothing protection.

entries.description: Stewards of life and the slumbering Dream.

entries.name: Ancient Green Wyrm

traits.name: Song of the Dream
traits.effect: A chorus that pacifies and renews.

traits.name: Eternal Bloom
traits.effect: Life energies muffle grievous harm.

entries.description: Ancients who bridge waking world and Dream.

entries.name: Red Whelp

traits.name: Spark Breath
traits.effect: A brief flare of healing fire or scorch.

traits.name: Kindled Heart
traits.effect: Small wounds knit faster.

entries.description: Fiery hatchlings already protective of the helpless.

entries.name: Red Drakonid

traits.name: Flamebrand
traits.effect: Searing swordplay that cleanses corruption.

traits.name: Lifeblood Scales
traits.effect: Fire heals lightly instead of burns.

entries.description: Defenders who mingle flame with restoration.

entries.name: Red Drake

traits.name: Cauterize Roar
traits.effect: A cleansing blast that sears rot away.

traits.name: Flame Ward
traits.effect: Embers swirl to blunt incoming strikes.

entries.description: Noble drakes patrolling sanctums of life.

entries.name: Red Dragon

traits.name: Life-Flame
traits.effect: A purifying inferno that scours corruption.

traits.name: Ruby Aegis
traits.effect: Radiant fire shields allies.

entries.description: Wardens of life and healers of grievous wounds.

entries.name: Ancient Red Wyrm

traits.name: Phoenix Gale
traits.effect: A life-kindling tempest of flame.

traits.name: Sanctuary of Scales
traits.effect: Greatly lessens corruption and decay.

entries.description: Ancients whose very presence kindles renewal.

entries.name: Bronze Whelp

traits.name: Time Blink
traits.effect: Flickers an instant out of phase, dodging a blow.

traits.name: Chronal Curiosity
traits.effect: Notices anomalies others miss.

entries.description: Playful keepers of temporal threads.

entries.name: Bronze Drakonid

traits.name: Sands of Delay
traits.effect: Staggers a foe’s next action.

traits.name: Temporal Ward
traits.effect: Briefly rewinds a bit of harm.

entries.description: Time-touched guardians of the caverns of time.

entries.name: Bronze Drake

traits.name: Chrono Breath
traits.effect: A sandstorm that slows and ages strikes.

traits.name: Foresight
traits.effect: Anticipates and softens incoming attacks.

entries.description: Temporal wardens that police branching histories.

entries.name: Bronze Dragon

traits.name: Time Collapse
traits.effect: Crushes a moment into a damaging pulse.

traits.name: Hourglass Ward
traits.effect: Edges of fate dull incoming harm.

entries.description: Dragons who steward timelines against paradox.

entries.name: Ancient Bronze Wyrm

traits.name: Eon Surge
traits.effect: Temporal wave that unravels hostile intent.

traits.name: Paradox Hide
traits.effect: Reality warps to spare them the worst.

entries.description: Ancients whose breaths taste of sand and centuries.

entries.name: Proto-Whelp

traits.name: Gnash
traits.effect: Savage bite that startles prey.

traits.name: Primeval Hide
traits.effect: Thick scales resist crude weapons.

entries.description: Primal hatchlings hatched in icy aeries and storm-scarred crags.

entries.name: Proto-Drake

traits.name: Rending Bite
traits.effect: Savage maw that leaves bleeding wounds.

traits.name: Primeval Roar
traits.effect: Shakes resolve of nearby foes.

entries.description: Ancient, horn-crowned drakes with brutal hunting patterns.

entries.name: Proto-Dragon

traits.name: Elemental Bellow
traits.effect: Chooses frost, fire, or storm to ravage enemies.

traits.name: Glacial/Voltaic Hide
traits.effect: Primal scales shrug off elemental harm.

entries.description: Rare elders among protodrakes—elemental titans of the skies.

entries.name: Twilight Whelp

traits.name: Shadow Spark
traits.effect: A flicker of void that unsettles.

traits.name: Unstable Scales
traits.effect: Occasional bursts of void backlash.

entries.description: Void-touched hatchlings bred from forbidden experiments.

entries.name: Twilight Drake

traits.name: Umbral Breath
traits.effect: A shadowy cone that saps vigor.

traits.name: Twilight Husk
traits.effect: Half-real scales distort incoming force.

entries.description: Dragons forged in shadow and flame to serve apocalyptic cults.

entries.name: Twilight Dragon

traits.name: Voidstorm
traits.effect: A swirling assault of shadow and embers.

traits.name: Eclipsed Form
traits.effect: Partially phases out of reality.

entries.description: Terrible fusions of void and dragonfire unleashed by zealots.

entries.name: Dracthyr Evoker

traits.name: Prismatic Breath
traits.effect: Channels a flight-themed blast (red/blue/green/bronze/black).

traits.name: Hover
traits.effect: Glides above ground to reposition safely.

entries.description: Awakened draconic soldiers who channel the powers of the flights.

entries.name: Dracthyr Dragonguard

traits.name: Wingshield
traits.effect: A sweeping guard that deflects blows.

traits.name: Scaled Resilience
traits.effect: Tempered scales blunt weapon harm.

entries.description: Frontline Dracthyr who hold the line while evokers cast.
